channel.title: Epistemic Humility on YOONSEO ZOH
channel.description: Recent content in Epistemic Humility on YOONSEO ZOH

item.title: Epistemic Humility
item.description: What cognitive mechanisms underlie our (in)ability to acknowledge the limits of comprehending others’ lived experiences? What are the interventions that can foster epistemic humility, and which cognitive processes could be targeted?
